trailingComments.value:
*
 * The `ComposerBody` component handles the body, or the content, of the
 * composer. Subclasses should implement the `onsubmit` method and override
 * `headerTimes`.
 *
 * ### Props
 *
 * - `originalContent`
 * - `submitLabel`
 * - `placeholder`
 * - `user`
 * - `confirmExit`
 * - `disabled`
 *
 * @abstract

leadingComments.value:
*
     * Whether or not the component is loading.
     *
     * @type {Boolean}

trailingComments.value:
*
     * The content of the text editor.
     *
     * @type {Function}

leadingComments.value:
*
     * The content of the text editor.
     *
     * @type {Function}
If the component is loading, we should disable the text editor.

trailingComments.value:
*
   * Draw focus to the text editor.

leadingComments.value:
*
   * Draw focus to the text editor.

trailingComments.value:
*
   * Check if there is any unsaved data – if there is, return a confirmation
   * message to prompt the user with.
   *
   * @return {String}

   * Check if there is any unsaved data – if there is, return a confirmation

   * @return {String}

comments.value:
*
 * The `ComposerBody` component handles the body, or the content, of the
 * composer. Subclasses should implement the `onsubmit` method and override
 * `headerTimes`.
 *
 * ### Props
 *
 * - `originalContent`
 * - `submitLabel`
 * - `placeholder`
 * - `user`
 * - `confirmExit`
 * - `disabled`
 *
 * @abstract

*
     * Whether or not the component is loading.
     *
     * @type {Boolean}

*
     * The content of the text editor.
     *
     * @type {Function}
If the component is loading, we should disable the text editor.

*
   * Draw focus to the text editor.

*
   * Check if there is any unsaved data – if there is, return a confirmation
   * message to prompt the user with.
   *
   * @return {String}

*
   * Build an item list for the composer's header.
   *
   * @return {ItemList}

*
   * Handle the submit event of the text editor.
   *
   * @abstract
